welcome_message_body: Welcome to Weston, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Weston has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly serving low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal with modern amenities and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and corporate aircrafts, offering premium services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at BCT, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at BCT, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
